# VSVersionInfo file for PyInstaller
# This file adds comprehensive version metadata to reduce antivirus false positives
# Generated automatically during build - do not edit manually
# Format compatible with PyInstaller on Windows and Wine

VSVersionInfo(
  ffi=FixedFileInfo(
    # filevers and prodvers should be always a tuple with four items: (1, 2, 3, 4)
    # Set not needed items to zero 0.
    filevers=(2025, 10, 28, 1),
    prodvers=(2025, 10, 28, 1),
    # Contains a bitmask that specifies the valid bits 'flags'
    mask=0x3f,
    # Contains a bitmask that specifies the Boolean attributes of the file.
    flags=0x0,
    # The operating system for which this file was designed.
    # 0x40004 - Windows NT/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
    OS=0x40004,
    # The general type of file.
    # 0x1 - the file is an application.
    fileType=0x1,
    # The function of the file.
    # 0x0 - the function is not defined for this fileType
    subtype=0x0,
    # Creation date and time stamp.
    date=(0, 0)
    ),
  kids=[
    StringFileInfo(
      [
      StringTable(
        u'040904B0',
        [StringStruct(u'CompanyName', u'RenExtract Open Source Community'),
        StringStruct(u'FileDescription', u'RenExtract - Professional Translation Tool for Ren\'Py Visual Novels'),
        StringStruct(u'FileVersion', u'2025.10.28.1'),
        StringStruct(u'InternalName', u'RenExtract'),
        StringStruct(u'LegalCopyright', u'Copyright (c) 2024-2025 Rory-Mercury-91 and Contributors. Licensed under MIT License.'),
        StringStruct(u'OriginalFilename', u'RenExtract 2025.10.28.v1.exe'),
        StringStruct(u'ProductName', u'RenExtract - Ren\'Py Translation Suite'),
        StringStruct(u'ProductVersion', u'2025.10.28.1'),
        StringStruct(u'Comments', u'Open Source translation and extraction tool for Ren\'Py visual novels. Safe and verified. GitHub: github.com/Rory-Mercury-91/RenExtract'),
        StringStruct(u'LegalTrademarks', u''),
        # Champs additionnels pour améliorer la confiance
        StringStruct(u'PrivateBuild', u''),
        StringStruct(u'SpecialBuild', u''),
        # Informations de contact et sécurité
        StringStruct(u'Info', u'This is a legitimate open-source application. Source code available at https://github.com/Rory-Mercury-91/RenExtract'),
        StringStruct(u'WWW', u'https://github.com/Rory-Mercury-91/RenExtract')])
      ]), 
    VarFileInfo([VarStruct(u'Translation', [1033, 1200])])
  ]
)
